actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that any adjustment in interest rates be made on an average annual basis rather than on an average monthly basis.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that any adjustment in interest rates on underpayments and overpayments of tax be made on an average annual basis rather than on an average monthly basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that any adjustment in interest rates be made on an average annual basis rather than on an average monthly basis.
